Question 72) A transport company needs to deliver an order as soon as possible. To this end, the logistics team analyzes the route from the company to the place of delivery. It finds that the route has two different stretches of distances and maximum maximum allowed speeds. In the first stretch, the maximum allowed speed is 80 km/h and the distance to be traveled is 80 km. In the second stretch, whose length is 60 km, the maximum allowed speed is 120 km/h.
Assuming that traffic conditions are favorable so that the company's vehicle is continually allowed at the maximum allowed speed, what will be the necessary time, in hours, for the delivery?
A) 0.7
B) 1.4
C) 1.5
D) 2.0
E) 3.0
